text: San Teodoro (Santu Diadòru, Santu Tiadòru) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 4,937 people lived there. Its area is 107.6 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 15 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: San Teodoro
